Starting and stopping the SongPlayer

Once you have a SongPlayer structure, you can start and stop playback at will.

	result = SongPlayer_Start( songPlayer );

If the function successfully returns 0, you're ready to synthesize MIDI from the XMF or MIDI file image and pass it to your sound playback hardware. You can start your audio hardware engine at this point.

	result = StartMyAudioDevice();

The function 

	result = SongPlayer_Stop( songPlayer );

stops playback. Restarting after stopping will resume synthesizing audio from the position in the file at which you stopped. To restart from the beginning of the file, you should stop, rewind and re-start the SongPlayer:

	result = SongPlayer_Stop( songPlayer );
	if( result < 0 ) handleError();

	result = SongPlayer_Rewind( songPlayer );
	if( result < 0 ) handleError();

	result = SongPlayer_Start( songPlayer );
	if( result < 0 ) handleError();
